name: Amulet of Resurrection
description: A magical amulet that prevents the wearer from dying once.

name: Arfrod Helmet
description: A metal helmet with the Arfrod emblem on the front.

name: Boomerang
description: A metal boomerang.

name: Climbing Tool Set
description: A set of climbing tools including spikes and rope.

name: Coil of Rope
description: A long coil of rope.

name: Communicator Artifact
description: A heavy steel artifact used to contact other similar artifacts.

name: Dragon Skin Cloak
description: A magnificent cloak crafted from the hide of a dragon.

name: Druid Cloak
description: A druid's majestic cloak of animal hides and plant material.

name: Dwarven Shield
description: A beautiful dwarven crafted large, red, rectangular shield.

name: Elemental Sword
description: A shiny sword hilt that, when activated, forms a blade of the wielder's element.

name: Ember Ring
description: A ring with a blazing red ruby. Gives +2 health.

name: Energy Shield
description: A gadget that, when activated, forms a shield of energy.

name: Etherium Helmet
description: A light helmet made of etherium that grants water breathing for up to two hours.

name: Fire-hardened Armour
description: A fire-hardened chestplate forged by a legendary blacksmith.

name: Gold Coin
description: A shiny golden coin

name: Gurnish Bracer
description: A sturdy bracer from a Gurnish stone.

name: Health Potion
description: A potion of crimson liquid that restores 15 health to the drinker.

name: Hebluff Chain Armour
description: A piece of chain armour made in Hebluff.

name: Jade Bracelet
description: A light bracelet made of pure jade. Gives +3 agility.

name: Leather Vest
description: A comfortable padded leather vest.

name: Mace
description: An iron mace with a smooth wooden handle

name: Map of Sharnon
description: A large parchment map of Sharnon.

name: Mithril Boots
description: A pair of mithril boots enchanted by Merlin the mage to give the wielder extreme speed.

name: Mithril Claws
description: A pair of claws made of pure mithril.

name: Mithril Scythe
description: A scythe with a mithril tip.

name: Potion Belt
description: A belt for holding potions.

name: Ration
description: A fat ration containing potatoes, meat, and carrots

name: Ring of Replenishing Energy
description: A golden ring that grants the wearer 1 energy every turn if the wearer attacked or cast a spell.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: A bomb that erupts in smoke when thrown.

name: Spear
description: A spear with a sharp steel tip.

name: Spiked Ring
description: A spiky iron ring that gives +1 attack.

name: Spyglass
description: A pirate's spyglass.

name: Staff
description: A tall oaken staff.

name: Steel Dagger
description: A sharpened steel dagger.

name: Steel Sword
description: A shiny steel sword.

name: Tent
description: A cloth tent

name: Throwing Knife
description: A razor sharp knife with a ring on the end, suitable for throwing.

name: Whistle
description: A cheap wooden whistle.
